Package com.db.chart.view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AxisController
    Class responsible to control vertical measures, positions, yadda yadda.
    BarChartView
    Implements a BarChartView extending BaseBarChartView
    BaseBarChartView
    Implements a bar chart extending ChartView
    BaseStackBarChartView
    Implements a bar chart extending BaseStackBarChartView
    ChartView
    Abstract class to be extend to define any chart that implies axis.
    HorizontalBarChartView
    Implements a HorizontalBarChartView extending ChartView
    HorizontalStackBarChartView
    Implements an HorizontalStackBarChart chart extending BaseStackBarChartView
    LineChartView
    Implements a line chart extending ChartView
    StackBarChartView
    Implements a StackBar chart extending BarChartView
    Tooltip
    Class representing chart's tooltips.
    XController
    Class responsible to control horizontal measures, positions, yadda yadda.
    YController
    Class responsible to control vertical measures, positions, yadda yadda.
